name: Crew
headline: Next Gen ATS/CRM for Modern Recruitment Agencies
description:
Crew is the next-gen ATS/CRM built just for recruiting agencies and independent recruiters. 

It’s all about modern sourcing, packed with cool automation and even a dash of AI. It's beautiful and well-designed. Plus, it’s deeply integrated with LinkedIn—because let’s be honest, that’s where we recruiters hang out most of the day. With Crew, you can forget about all that tedious copying/pasting, and tab-switching, making your workday a whole lot smoother.

founders.name: Amine Skalli, Founder
founders.description:
Founder @Crew. 
Prior to Crew I co-founded a recruiting marketplace for remote software engineers, and was a professional recruiter for 4 years.

generated_description:
### Crew: Revolutionizing Recruitment

**Overview**  
Founded in 2021 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S21, Crew is a Paris-based startup on a mission to transform recruitment with its next-gen Applicant Tracking System (ATS) and Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software. Designed specifically for recruitment agencies and independent recruiters, Crew is all about modern hiring—think sleek design, powerful automation, and smart AI features.

**Key Features**  
- **LinkedIn Integration**: Recognizing that LinkedIn is where recruiters spend much of their time, Crew offers seamless integration with the platform to minimize tedious data entry and enhance user experience. 
- **Automation & AI**: Crew leverages automation for multiple tasks—from sourcing to outreach—making the hiring process faster and more efficient. For example, recruiters can use AI to generate personalized messages quickly and effortlessly.
- **Centralized Data**: All team members have access to a single source of truth that updates in real-time, ensuring everyone is on the same page.
- **Analytics**: Crew provides in-depth insights, helping organizations refine their strategies and make decisions backed by data.

**User Experience**  
The platform has received high praise for its intuitive design, boasting a rating of 4.8 on Product Hunt and 5 on the Chrome store. Users highlight the significant boost in response rates thanks to its personalized outreach capabilities across multiple channels.

**Team & Partnerships**  
Crew operates with a tight-knit team of six, guided by their Group Partner, Nan. They collaborate with various recruiting teams to continuously enhance the platform's functionalities based on real-world feedback.

**Community Feedback**  
Clients rave about Crew's ability to streamline their processes, effectively replacing multiple tools with one easy-to-use system. Testimonials from partners like Arthur Olivier and Benjamin Watrinet underscore the tool’s efficiency and intuitive design, stating that it saves time and improves connection with candidates.

**Current Offerings**  
- **Demo Requests**: Interested users can easily request a demo to see Crew in action.
- **Resources**: Crew provides a blog and hiring guides to support recruiters in navigating the hiring landscape.

To explore more about Crew or sign up for a demo, visit [Crew's website](https://crew.work/). 

In a world where finding and managing talent can feel overwhelming, Crew is carving out a niche that makes hiring not just manageable, but enjoyable—one impactful placement at a time.
